quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear lack of them.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: Physics is the universe's operating system.
quotes.author: Steven R Garman

quotes.quote: It works on my machine
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Software is like sex. It's better when it's free.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: UNIX is simple. It just takes a genius to understand its simplicity.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: Potential partners are like internet domain names — the ones I like are already taken.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: vi vi vi — the editor of the beast.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There’s no place like 127.0.0.1.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good code is its own best documentation
quotes.author: Steve McConnell

quotes.quote: Think twice, code once.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Sassy, classy, and bad-assy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Who reads these anyways?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I think Microsoft named .Net so it wouldn’t show up in a Unix directory listing.
quotes.author: Oktal

quotes.quote: The cheapest, fastest, and most reliable components are those that aren’t there.
quotes.author: Gordon Bell

quotes.quote: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only relationship I have is with my Wi-Fi. We have a connection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed; call it version 1.0
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you watch an Apple store get robbed, are you an iWitness?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
quotes.author: Unknown
